verse: वेदानुद्धरते जगति वहते भूगोलमुद्विभ्रते । दैत्यं दारयते बलिं छलयते क्षत्रक्षयं कुर्वते
meaning: Meaning:These lines describe the capabilities and actions of the subject. The subject here refers to someone who possesses the ability to do the following:They uplift (reveal) the knowledge (Veda) in the world, carry forward the creation, disrupt the stability of land (geography), impart discipline to the demonic (asura), deceive (trick) strength (power), and establish power (rule) by destroying (conquering) other rulers.These verses highlight the power and influence that the subject possesses over various aspects of life, and imply that they have the ability to reshape and manipulate the world through their actions.
